passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (PHY excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; When there is another "Otherworld Warriors" or "Tournament Participants" Category ally attacking in the same turn: All allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 40% up; As the 2nd attacker in a turn: (Once) "Otherworld Warriors" or "Tournament Participants" Category allies' damage reduction rate 10% up for 2 turns; As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn: Guards all attacks; High chance of performing a critical hit; Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 150% up
